items.content_html: Express.js is a lightweight and flexible Node.js web framework that simplifies web and API development. It provides features like routing, middleware, static file serving, and request handling. Widely used for building RESTful APIs, it allows developers to create scalable, asynchronous, and efficient applications with minimal configuration.
items.title: Hi-Dear-486/Expressjs: Express.js is a lightweight and flexible Node.js web framework that simplifies web and API development. It provides features like routing, middleware, static file serving, and request handling. Widely used for building RESTful APIs, it allows developers to create scalable, asynchronous, and efficient applications with minimal configuration.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
